name: 守麥精靈黛芽
description:
features


"Wheat Fairy of Daya" is a action game,you will be a wheat fairy girl who needs to against all odds to make the wheats grow up.
There are more than 16 levels which you need to live under the weather,birds and other more than 5 other fairy bosses' attack.
If you survive at the end of each level, you will receive points based on your performance, which will affect the different endings you will end up in.

  • more than 6-7 skills you can use!
  • more than 5 bosses you can challenge!
  • Sunny,Rainy,and more other weather exprience!
  • Get Special CG Arts in different endings!

Game Play

After charging the accumulated energy, click on the target that harms the wheat field to shoot.
There will also be many attacks on you in the wheat fields.
Be careful to press "avoid" and seize the moment to press "charge up" to knock down the target!



You can Absorb various energies from nature to release skills of various attributes!
Based on your performance,there have 6 skills you can get!
Combine different skills to make your own attack style!
publishers: 碧戥與艾絲卡菲的遊戲坊
